title: Over 10K consumer complaints against Ola Electric in last 1yr; CCPA issues notice to company
description: Consumer rights regulator CCPA issues a notice to Ola Electric for over 10,000 unresolved complaints related to quality and after-sales service. Key issues include charging during warranty, delayed services, inconsistent performance, refusal of warranty services, and battery defects. Ola Electric is given 15 days to respond.
